entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -27.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 07:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -27.9°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -31.4°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
